1.0.name: wordpress/calicotek-floating-social-slider
1.0.description: this simple plugin adds a social slider to the side of any website so far it supports facebook, twitter, google plus, and site email... when the user of the site hovers over the social sliders they slide out using java script,.. social profiles can be configured via a admin settings page...
